title: Multi-asset
description: A generic term for a ledger which supports multiple different asset types natively.

props.body: Ledgers that support accounting or transaction of more than one type of asset are considered to have \'multi-asset\' functionality. These ledgers can include blockchains, wallets, cryptocurrencies, or banking platforms, for example. Multi-assets usually include a platform\'s primary currency and multiple, user-defined assets.
